column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////! My boyfriend surprised me with brunch here and it could not have been better! We arrived at opening time without a reservation for Sunday brunch. They told us that it was no problem but that we would only get 2 hours which is plenty of time. Our server was very attentive and the food was spot on. I ordered the short rib chillequiles and a bloody mary. At first I thought the serving seemed small for the price
column2: but halfway through I was stuffed! The Bloody Mary was ok
column4: but not their specialty. The service was quick
column6: and the decor was fabulous! I really enjoyed the look they have going.  It is a hoppin place but doesn't feel overcrowded like some places where they stuff in as many tables as possible.  Overall
